item.title: TLDR; Duplex: Dual GAT for Complex Embeddings of Directed Graphs
item.description: Source Link to heading Paper link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.05391 Source Code: https://github.com/alipay/DUPLEX Abstract Link to heading I am a huge fan of Graph Machine Learning, it has a lot of cool applications, and I am particularly interested in Source Code understanding and Vulnerability Detection, where Graph Neural Networks (GNN) are unambiguous. One of the obvious downsides of general GNNs is that they mostly focus on undirected graphs, which makes their approach somewhat limiting for Digraphs (fancy name for directed graphs).
